name: Machine Made for Idealists
description:
A duck, tired of running away from rogue drones, has stumbled upon a weapon with the ability combat against machines. Fight back in this 2D shooter where you go through waves of enemy robots. After each wave, you can upgrade your stats to become stronger and optionally obtain cursed perks that will have both benefits and disbenefits.

Controls:

A - Move left

D - Move right

Space - Jump

Mouse - Aim

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

Double Tap A or D - Dash

Music:

Spazzmatica Polka by Kevin MacLeod

Link https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4402-spazzmatica-polka

License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license

Precious Memories by Shane Ivers - https://www.silvermansound.com

Credits:

Khang (Khyan) - Start Menu Design, Spritework, and Enemy AI

A game made for the game jam IGD Game Jam - itch.io with the theme "Both or Neither" (and kind of "A Day in the Life of a Duck").
